# gray

Aa1 𓐍 Gray Circle PIE:kwrkwr 𓊖

𓐍 gray ⋍ char-coal-black @ Turk (хура,кiр,kirli), Slavic(černý), Mongolian (хар), Japanese (黒 くろ kuro), Hindi काला kālā, Bantu (umukara)

𓐍 green-grey 🜨 "verdigris" copper-acids 𓄿 𓐍 | grow green

𓐍 𓐍 | blue-black | kar қара ⇔ 𓎡𓎡𓇰 𒈪 𒍼 gig / negro kako

𐀐𐀨𐀜 ke-ra-no kara gray "dark, black" <> grün? 𐀐𐀨𐀜 ke-la-no κελαινός काला kālā klamm calm cool "dark, black"

𓎼 𓂋 𓎛 𓇰 | night | gray gloomy ⇔ dark khem ⇔ quiet

𒄴 ≈ 𓐍 in 𒄖𒄴𒇻 gu-uḫ-lu guḫlu kohl ( kala = black colors )

𓐍 kako = black
𓐍 gray grey
𓐍 գորշ ɡɔɾʃ
𓐍 կեղտոտ kɛʁtɔt dirty

𓐍 ϭⲱⲣ, ⲭⲣⲉⲙⲧⲥ char, khremts (smoke)

𓐍 chemo 𓆎 𓅓 𓁸 ⲭⲁⲙⲉⳕ Khem Khmer

𓇋 𓐍 𓐍 𓅱 𓇰 𓏥 | twilight, dusk | ⇔ gray
𓇋 𓐍 𓐍 𓅱 𓇶 | twilight, dusk |

𓎡𓎡𓇰 = 𒈪 GIG գիշեր ɡiʃɛɾ חושך khóshekh

𓐍 gir gri gray 𓐍 kalai कालाि cara կեղտոտ kɛʁtɔt (dirty) 𒊹 šar syr sir sya sywa = BLACK char coal
𓐍 Sumerian: ge6, giggi (ge6), gi6, ĝi6 gig2 “black” 𒈪 Milan MES, meš3 𓅓
𓐍 Ghuar ⋍ šar 𒊹 swahistan schwarz սեւ sɛv sɛv.az чёрный chernuigh ⇔ negro
